targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  door_status.id,
  CASE
    WHEN door_status.status = 0 THEN -1
    WHEN door_status.status = 1 THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, door_status.timestamp, now())
    ELSE -2
  END AS passed
FROM door_status
LEFT JOIN door ON door_status.id = door.id
WHERE door.link_code = 1 and door.floor = 5
ORDER BY door_status.id

SELECT
  door_status.id,
  CASE
    WHEN door_status.status = 0 THEN -1
    WHEN door_status.status = 1 THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, door_status.timestamp, now())
    ELSE -2
  END AS passed
FROM door_status
LEFT JOIN door ON door_status.id = door.id
WHERE door.link_code = 0 and door.floor = 5 and vertical_move = 1
ORDER BY door_status.id

  door_status.id,
